Sword Masters: Two Champions of Shaolin
Meng Lo, Sheng Chiang, Li Wang, Siu-Ho Chin, Feng Lu, Chien Sun, Hsueh-erh Wen, Tai-Ping Yu

Shaolin warrior Tung Chien-chen is injured in battle against the hated Wu Tang clan, and nursed back to health by a knife-throwing master. As he recovers, Tung learns this deadly art, and also falls in love with his teacher's daughter.
